name: I. “HIC INCIPIT VITAE”. Infans (innocentia). SPECIAL EDITION.
description:
SPECIAL BONUS HOLOGRAM EDITION from the “Renaissance” genesis collection.
It’s a collection that emerges from past eras to reconnect us with our nature as human beings and remind us four of the stages of human development. 

Description of the piece:
This is the first stage of growth. Characterized by playfulness and magical thinking. Where the main motivation is the search for fun and discovery of the world. In this stage, reality is covered with a cloak of innocence and naivety, showing it as a paradise. Presenting itself as an illusion difficult to elucidate.
That is why the author represented this moment with a party, a bacchanalia.

MP4 - 1080 ×1560px

Full story here: nft.matiasmarano.com/renaissance
